PARTNERS

Support Us

While we are passionate to advance the frontiers of synthetic biology, we can't do it completely by ourselves. This project couldn't be accomplished without the support of our partners.

If you or your organization would like to support us in some way, contact us at team (at) aaltohelsinki.com, or give us a call: +358 40 822 9925.

All of our supporters will be mentioned on this page and additional benefits can be negotiated.

Our Supporters
